en.group_player_count_desc: Select how many Universal group players should be created.
en.group_player_players_desc: Select the players that should be part of this group.
en.group_player_master_desc: Select the player that should act as group master.

nl.group_player_count_desc: Selecteer hoeveel groep spelers er aangemaakt moeten worden.
nl.group_player_players_desc: Selecteer de spelers die deel uitmaken van deze groep.
nl.group_player_master_desc: Selecteer de speler die dient als groepsbeheerder.
